greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Table read by rows: T(n,k) is the number of divisors of k that are <= n.
comment: Suggested by a question from _Eric Desbiaux_.
The row lengths are the lengths before the pattern for n repeats.
program: (PARI) lista(nrows) = {for (n=1, nrows, for (k=1, lcm(vector(n, i, i)), print1(sumdiv(k, d, d <=n), ", ");); print(););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jun 19 2014
xref: Row lengths A003418, row sums A025529, frequencies in rows A096180.
results.author: _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Mar 24 2008
ext: Definition corrected by _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Jun 19 2014
